Veterans have sacrificed so much for us. But our outdated federal marijuana laws prevent vets who work in their state’s legal cannabis industry from getting a VA-backed home loan to realize the dream of homeownership. I have a bipartisan bill for that. https://www.bostonglobe.com/2019/12/18/marijuana/elizabeth-warren-files-marijuana-bills-veterans-immigrants/?event=event25 …

It’s nonsense that Americans should have to ration their life-saving prescriptions because a handful of giant drug companies have rigged the market to jack up prices & line their pockets. Drug manufacturers are charging sky-high prices – and Congress must act to stop them.

In 1996, Eli Lilly’s insulin cost $21/vial. Today, it’s about $300/vial in the United States. The millions of Americans living with diabetes don’t need insults from Lilly’s highly paid CEO – they need the drug that they can’t live without.

Eli Lilly broke its promise to provide cheaper generic insulin to the American people. Most pharmacies we surveyed don’t have it & can’t order it. That may be “nonsense” to you, Mr. Ricks – but it’s not nonsense to people who can’t afford insulin. https://www.cnbc.com/2019/12/17/warren-claims-eli-lilly-failed-on-cheaper-insulin-ceo-says-nonsense.html …

I'm proud of the entire Massachusetts delegation for fulfilling their oath to defend the United States Constitution today. Thank you, @RepRichardNeal, @RepMcGovern, @RepLoriTrahan, @RepJoeKennedy, @RepKClark, @TeamMoulton, @RepPressley, @RepStephenLynch, & @USRepKeating.

US Senators take an oath to support & defend the Constitution, not the President of the United States. The Constitution requires the Senate to conduct a fair & honest impeachment trial, & that’s what the American people expect.

My #StopWallStreetLooting Act with @RepMarkPocan & others would hold private equity firms responsible for the liabilities of companies under their control & require greater transparency in private equity firms’ practices. Our economy – and our planet – can’t wait any longer.

It is deeply disturbing that a US private equity firm like @Blackstone has invested in Brazilian logistics company Hidrovias to take advantage of weakened environmental safeguards & boost their short-term profits at the expense of our global climate & Indigenous communities.

Private equity firm @Blackstone has made big investments in companies that are destroying the Amazon rainforest. @RepMarkPocan, @RepRaulGrijalva, @RepDebHaaland, @RepRashida, @RepChuyGarcia, @SenWhitehouse & I want them to explain their business practices. https://www.politico.com/news/2019/12/16/elizabeth-warren-blackstone-086197 …

3 drug companies produce 80%+ of all insulin, & lack of competition is crushing families. That’s why @janschakowsky & I have a bill to let @HHSgov manufacture generic drugs like insulin to fix the broken market. And I support #M4A so nobody goes broke paying for health care.

Our staff called nearly 400 pharmacies across the country. 83% didn't have @LillyPad’s generic insulin in stock, & 69% of those said they couldn’t order it. Eli Lilly needs to take meaningful steps to increase insulin access & make Humalog more affordable pic.twitter.com/dGbMgqBmvA

Pharmaceutical giant Eli Lilly promised in March that it would provide patients with a lower-priced generic insulin. But @SenBlumenthal & I conducted a months-long survey of pharmacies & found that @LillyPad hasn't lived up to its promise. https://www.warren.senate.gov/oversight/reports/senators-warren-and-blumenthal-release-investigation-revealing-diabetes-patients-lack-of-access-to-lower-priced-insulin …

It’s been 2 years since the Trump administration gutted #NetNeutrality. And it’s been 8 months since the House passed the #SaveTheInternet Act to restore those rules for a free & open internet. Predatory for-profit colleges don't care about educating students – they’re in the business of sucking down federal student aid. That’s why I support @SenSherrodBrown & @RepJayapal’s #StudentsNotProfits Act to end taxpayer subsidies to these schools. It’s time for this to end.

Instead of helping defrauded students, @BetsyDeVosED & @usedgov have come up with an arbitrary & nonsense scheme to choke off any reasonable debt cancellation for students cheated by sham for-profits. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/10/business/betsy-devos-student-loan-forgiveness.html …

The University of Phoenix used deceptive ads to lure students in with big promises of well-paid jobs – then loaded them up with debt & useless degrees. @BetsyDeVosED & @usedgov need to follow the @FTC’s lead & cancel @UOPX students’ federal loans. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/10/business/university-phoenix-ftc-ads.html …

.@RepJayapal & I have introduced the most ambitious bill to #EndCorruptionNow since Watergate, which would force Presidents to fully divest from their businesses – and hotels. We need to fundamentally change how Washington works – and who Washington works for.

Taxpayers shouldn’t have to pay the legal bills of a private company, and the government shouldn’t protect a private prison carrying out inhumane immigration policies – especially one that bats its eyelashes from the Trump Hotel lobby.

Of all the hotels in DC, why did the Senior VP of GEO Group – one of @ICEgov’s private prison operators – stay at the Trump Hotel while asking the admin for a favor to pay its legal fees? @RepJayapal & I have serious concerns about possible corruption. https://www.thedailybeast.com/elizabeth-warren-says-private-prison-companys-spending-at-trump-hotel-is-possible-corruption …

The NDAA does nothing to end our disastrous and inhumane support for Saudi ops in Yemen, nothing to prevent a war with Iran, and permits the deployment of a destabilizing low yield nuke weapon. For that and 738 billion other reasons, I don’t support the bill.
The Pentagon’s budget has been too large for too long. I cannot support a defense bill that’s a $738 billion Christmas present to giant defense contractors & undermines our values and security.

Pete Frates challenged us all to fight harder for a cure to ALS – & in doing so he inspired the world. My heart goes out to Pete’s wife, daughter, family & friends in MA & across the US. These schools have waited for funding certainly long enough – the House should pass the #FUTUREAct right away. https://thehill.com/homenews/senate/473196-bipartisan-bill-to-permanently-fund-historically-black-colleges-passes-in …

Most of the big banks are bigger now than when taxpayers bailed them out in 2008, & the @BBT/@SunTrust merger will make this Too Big to Fail risk even worse. It’s time for Congress & our regulators to stand up to big banks & protect the American people. https://www.warren.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senator-warren-and-representative-garca-announce-introduction-of-the-bank-merger-review-modernization-act-to-end-rubber-stamping-of-bank-merger-applications …

Our bank merger bill would force regulators to consider how a bank merger affects consumers’ access to products like mortgages & small business loans. And it would require regulators to reject any bank merger that puts the economy – and working families – at risk.

Nearly 2 years ago, Chairman Powell confirmed my worst suspicions: the @FederalReserve hasn’t denied a single bank merger since the 2008 financial crisis. @RepChuyGarcia & I are introducing a new bill to make sure regulators do their jobs & stop rubber-stamping bank mergers. pic.twitter.com/SCUkvRPwrv

We need big, bold action to fight the #ClimateCrisis – & I’m in this fight all the way. That’s why I’m proud to be an original cosponsor of @SenMarkey & @RepAOC’s #GreenNewDeal resolution to transform our economy & save our planet for our children & grandchildren.

The evidence is clear: climate change threatens our economy. And I have bills for that. I introduced the Climate Risk Disclosure Act & cosponsored @SenBrianSchatz’s Climate Change Financial Risk Act to make our economy more resilient to the #ClimateCrisis. https://prospect.org/environment/the-biggest-threat-to-financial-stability-is-the-climate/ …

We should be expanding this program – not tearing it apart. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/12/04/us/politics/food-stamps.html …

20 years ago, the @WorcesterFD courageously ran into a burning warehouse, & six brave firefighters didn’t make it out. Today we honor the Worcester 6, & we remember the sacrifice that all our firefighters make to keep us safe every day. #W6 https://www.masslive.com/worcester/2019/12/the-worcester-6-twenty-years-ago-six-firefighters-died-fighting-the-cold-storage-fire-now-several-of-their-sons-carry-on-the-firefighting-tradition.html …

For far too long, big corporations have taken advantage of part-time workers with unpredictable work schedules – creating real hardships for them. My bill with @RepSchakowsky strengthens the rights, stability, & other protections workers deserve to build better financial futures.

The Part-Time Worker Bill of Rights Act would:
❌ Require big companies to offer available hours to part-time employees before hiring new employees/subcontractors
❌ Make more part-time employees eligible for FMLA
❌ Give part-time workers access to pension plans

2/3 of part-time retail & food workers want full-time work – but corporations often keep workers part-time to save on wages & benefits. @RepSchakowsky & I are introducing the Part-Time Worker Bill of Rights Act to boost protections for part-time workers. https://www.warren.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senator-warren-and-representative-schakowsky-unveil-legislation-to-strengthen-part-time-workers-rights-as-holiday-shopping-season-begins …

All workers, including Harvard grad students, should have the right to organize & fight for better wages & working conditions. I've joined the entire MA delegation in urging Harvard’s leadership to negotiate in good faith with @hgsuuaw for a fair agreement. pic.twitter.com/x5tOu9SEt8
